description: combined unique name of {segment_id}_{segment_split_id}
segment id unique within each Segmentation
unique id for each single soma neuron split from the segment id
visual area (['AL', 'RL', 'V1']) of the location of soma center
layer (['L1', 'L2/L3', 'L4', 'L5', 'L6', 'WM']) of the location of soma center
the total number of single soma neurons extracted from segment_id
cell typing method used to decide the proofreading rules applied: "baylor" or "allen"
inhibitory or excitatory
closest nucleus id matched to the soma center within a 15000 nm bounding box around soma center
the distance to the closest nuclei paired to that segment id (even if no matching nuclei found within threshold)
Number of nuclei detected within a 15000 nm radius of the soma center
Number of nuclei within the bounding box of that soma mesh
x coordinate of soma center in EM voxels (x: 4nm, y: 4nm, z: 40nm)
y coordinate of soma center in EM voxels (x: 4nm, y: 4nm, z: 40nm)
z coordinate of soma center in EM voxels (x: 4nm, y: 4nm, z: 40nm)
x coordinate of soma center in nm (helps match to neuron skeleton soma point)
y coordinate of soma center in nm (helps match to neuron skeleton soma point)
z coordinate of soma center in nm (helps match to neuron skeleton soma point)

volume of the soma mesh
surface area of soma mesh

inhibitory or excitatory class before cell
number of nuclei detected for segment from e/i table
